long_description: With its low-profile design, the REI Fitness Visor maximizes ventilation and shades your eyes to keep you cool and comfortable when you're running or hiking. Stretch nylon fabric dries quickly; polyester mesh lining wicks moisture away from skin to keep you dry and cool in warm weather. Reflective details in back enhance visibility in low light. The REI Fitness Visor features an adjustable rear closure for a snug fit.
short_description: With its low-profile design, the REI Fitness Visor maximizes ventilation and shades your eyes to keep you cool and comfortable when you're running or hiking.
